languages.text: "Кто свидетельствует, что слова сего мужа правдивы?"
"Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"
languages.original_text: "Кто свидетельствует, что слова сего мужа правдивы?"

traits.locale_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"

traits.locale_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «¿Quién será testigo de la verdad de las palabras de este Lobo?».
languages.original_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién será testigo de la verdad de las palabras de este Lobo?».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “谁愿意证明这头野狼说的是真的？”
languages.original_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"

traits.locale_text: “谁愿意证明这头野狼说的是真的？”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「誰がこのウルフの言葉の真実を証言できるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"

traits.locale_text: 「誰がこのウルフの言葉の真実を証言できるだろうか？」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Qui témoignera de la véracité du récit de ce Wolf ? »
languages.original_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"

traits.locale_text: « Qui témoignera de la véracité du récit de ce Wolf ? »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Wer wird die Wahrheit der Worte dieses Wolfs bezeugen?"
languages.original_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"

traits.locale_text: "Wer wird die Wahrheit der Worte dieses Wolfs bezeugen?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Kurt'un sözlerinin doğruluğuna şahitlik edecek kim var?"
languages.original_text: "Who will bear witness to the truth of this Wolf's words?"
